title: [Skin concept] Shyvana - Pillow fight
body:
Too bad Shyvana never got a funny skin like Battle bunny riven or others.
Here is an idea that came up in the forum once and became quite popular in the Shyvana threads.

Pillow fight Shyvana

http://fc06.deviantart.net/fs71/i/2013/260/b/8/pillowfight_shyvana_by_vaejoun-d6mof9l.jpg

Q: On hit a *puff* sound is played and some feathers appear, slowly falling down.
W: A storm of feathers swirling around her
E: Obviously a flying pillow instead of a fireball
R: http://www.google.de/url?source=imgres&ct=tbn&q=http://33.media.tumblr.com/4a6e4779e68b22be661cc349733a0455/tumblr_mr4n2kwYgA1sd5bqgo1_500.png&sa=X&ei=c7oqVJytCIS9ygO2noGQBA&ved=0CAUQ8wc&usg=AFQjCNFBIDC4O7-NNClr9gAJqvLOGEn3_g

If you like my works, you can visit my blog or follow me on Facebook.
https://www.me-artbook.blogspot.de
https://www.facebook.com/markus.erdt.5

replies.body: up-voting for majestic pillow dragon. ;u;

LOL pfft, why would I run in terror from that? hahahaha
Nice theme though

You dont have to run. Skins are more for the people playing the champ and as a Shyvana player I would love to thro pillows at my opponents in such a silly get-up. ^^

Glad you like it.

> [{quoted}](name=JesterCapp,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=LAlsBxaE,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2014-09-30T18:38:15.583+0000)
>
> up-voting for majestic pillow dragon. ;u;

plzzz make im dying over this <333

Too silly for my taste. Way too silly. You could bring Corporate Mundo into the argument, but Mundo was always silly be default. I guess it's ok, but then atleast have something with more dignity for the dragon form.
Silly skins: All sports-themed skins, Surprise Party Fiddlesticks, Kennen MD, Surgeon Shen, Nurse Akali, Surfer Singed, Dunk Master Darius

Good point. Nurse Akali I dont see as silly. I probably should, though it's oddly enough almost too fitting. and Surgeon Shen looks more like something sinister out of a horror flick, so it's alright in my book. Sports themed skins... just for Lucian I think it's fair just because of the reference. But yeah the rest I don't really like. Especially SP Fiddle... ugh.

Also: Definately-not- & boxing Blitzcrank, Battlebunny Riven, Reverse Annie, Armor of the Fifth Age Taric.

It is hard to say there is no room for silliness in a game call "LoL".

Never said there wasn't room for sillliness. Just said it didn't appeal to me.
Battle bunny riven isnt silly in my opinion. The Taric skin I've been told is a WoW reference. It seems valid enough to me.
It's silly because they took a character who's clearly supposed to be ambiguously gay, and decked him in pink and furry legwarmers.
Gentleman Cho!

I've suggested it for nearly 2 years now, there should be a Slumber Party/Pillow Fight line of skins.

Imagine {{champion:134}}  throwing pillows around, with her ult resulting in a HUGE flurry of feathers.

Or {{champion:48}} , who's club could be a whole mattress tied up with a rope or something, and his pillar could be a big pillow fort with a "no gurlz alowed!" sign on it.

I wouldnt think they'd be more than 975. Relatively small amounts of model changes, basic feathery spell effects, etc.

It's a cool idea but I'd more like to see Pillow Fight Irelia.
A pillow barrage ultimate would be just perfect.
Messy hair short shorts pajama wearing Shyvana is definitely the best XD

I'm torn on this one. Mainly because I love how thematic Shyvana is with with her skin library being so closely attuned to dragonic types, but at the sametime she doesn't have anything distinctively fun either.
This is way cool, but at the same time way out of personality.
I like it, but my conscience says no :/
Love the skin sadly they are already making a skin for her (Championship)
First photo looks like Vi

Good skin, bad champion.
Pillow fight vi mite be better.
Why not both? You need two to ~~tango~~ pillowfight.
I always thought Vi would go better with those socker boppers from like the 90s
How can you not love this idea ?
PLEASE
Imagine a battle bunny Shyvana WHERE SHYVANA TURNS INTO A BUNNY DRAGON!
please; I will say though, this needs some major voice changes to match the skin

Pillow Fight Skin Line-up:

Shyvana (Jungle)
Vi (Top)
Caitlyn (ADC) (Pillow Launcher ftw!)
Sona (Support)
Syndra (Mid)
all for one mirror mode PILLOW FIGHT
+1 for that ult XD

All Hail the majestic pillow dragon!


riot please :(
Dope
I'll allow it
